item.description:
Facebook invite: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=195933777090402

The Countdown to Carnival Masquerade at the Middle East Downstairs will happen on Friday, 2/25 and will feature Mardi Gras brass band explosions, Ethiopian trance grooves, Braz-American Rock music sandwiches, and a Brazilian Samba dance party.

 

The music!

http://ensmb.com/

http://deboband.com/

http://tomnmusic.com/

http://afrobrazil.org/

 

Get your discounted tickets in advance and pay only $10: http://www.ticketweb.com/t3/sale/SaleEventDetail?dispatch=loadSelectionData&eventId=3350055&REFID=elink&pl=mideastclub

It’s going to be a raucous occasion to dress up and celebrate the start of Carnival, Mardi Gras, Saturnalia or whatever you fancy. Whether you have an elegant Venetian mask or some zany Brazilian headwear, sport it and come dance. "Bunda" means bum bum in Portuguese. It's your job to bring it and shake it.

Friday, February 25th

9 PM

The Middle East Downstairs

480 Mass. Ave (Central Sq.) Cambridge, MA

18+

$10 advance/ $12 day of show
item.why: Hey everyone. I wanted to let you know about a show I am organizing. Kick-off Carnival at the interstellar, multi-cultural party of the year with Emporer Norton's Stationary Marching Band, Debo Band, Tōmn, and Marcus Santos' AfroBrazil.
item.name: Countdown to Carnival Masquerade w/AfroBrazil+Tomn+Debo Band+ENSMB
